text: In Papua New Guinea, the academic grading system scales from A (or First Class Honors) to D (or a Fail). {| class="wikitable" !Grade description !Division !Grade |- |First Class Honors | |A |- |Second Class Honors |Upper Division |A-/B+ |- |Third Class Honors | |B |- |Second Class Honors |Lower Division |B- |- |Pass | |C |- |Fail | |D |} == References == Papua New Guinea Category:Education in Papua New Guinea Category:Academia in Papua New Guinea
title: Academic grading in Papua New Guinea
